mapper.insert: insert into magnet_db (title, actress, subline, HD, magnet, num, types, date) values (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{magnet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{types,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into magnet_db
title,
actress,
subline,
HD,
magnet,
num,
types,
date,
#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{actress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{subline,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{hd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{magnet,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{types,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select:
select distinct count(*) from magnet_db m
and m.actress like '%' #{actress}'%'
and m.types like '%' #{types}'%'
and m.subline like '%' #{subline}'%'
and m.num like '%' #{num}'%'
and m.HD like '%' #{HD}'%'
and m.title like '%' #{title}'%'
and #{date} >= m.date
and m.producer like '%' #{producer} '%'
and m.magnet is not null

select distinct m.title,m.actress,m.subline,m.HD,m.magnet,m.num, m.types, m.date,m.producer from magnet_db m left join magnet_types t1 on m.num =t1.num
and m.actress like '%' #{actress} '%'
and m.subline like '%' #{subline} '%'
and m.HD like '%' #{HD} '%'
and m.title like '%' #{title} '%'
and m.producer like '%' #{producer} '%'
and #{date} >= m.date
and t1.type1 like '%' #{types} '%' or t1.type2 like '%' #{types} '%' or t1.type3 like '%' #{types} '%' or t1.type4 like '%' #{types} '%' or t1.type5 like '%' #{types} '%' or t1.type6 like '%' #{types} '%' or t1.type7 like '%' #{types} '%' or t1.type8 like '%' #{types} '%' or t1.type9 like '%' #{types} '%' or t1.type10 like '%' #{types} '%' or t1.type11 like '%' #{types} '%' or t1.type12 like '%' #{types} '%' or t1.type13 like '%' #{types} '%' or t1.type14 like '%' #{types} '%' or t1.type15 like '%' #{types} '%'
and m.magnet is not null order by m.date desc limit #{beginNo},#{pageSize}
select distinct magnet from magnet_db where num = #{num}
